mapper.sql: a.ID as "id" , a.ORG_ID as "orgId" , a.JH_MC as "jhMc" , a.JH_RS as "jhRs" , a.PX_DX as "pxDx" , a.PS_QS as "psQs" , a.MQ_TS as "mqTs" , a.JH_YD as "jhYd" , a.JH_JD as "jhJd" , a.JH_YF as "jhYf" , a.PX_DD as "pxDd" , a.YS_JE as "ysJe" , a.REMARKS as "remarks" , a.ENABLE_FLAG as "enableFlag" , a.DEL_FLAG as "delFlag" , a.CREATE_BY as "createBy" , a.CREATE_DATE as "createDate" , a.UPDATE_BY as "updateBy" , a.UPDATE_DATE as "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM t_px_pxjh a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_px_pxjh( ID , ORG_ID , JH_MC , JH_RS , PX_DX , PS_QS , MQ_TS , JH_YD , JH_JD , JH_YF , PX_DD , YS_JE , REMARKS , ENABLE_FLAG , DEL_FLAG , CREATE_BY , CREATE_DATE , UPDATE_BY , UPDATE_DATE ) values( #{id} , #{orgId} , #{jhMc} , #{jhRs} , #{pxDx} , #{psQs} , #{mqTs} , #{jhYd} , #{jhJd} , #{jhYf} , #{pxDd} , #{ysJe} , #{remarks} , #{enableFlag} , #{delFlag} , #{createBy} , #{createDate} , #{updateBy} , #{updateDate} )
